headline: Credit Market Resilient Amid Pockets of Stress: BlackRock's Lynam
summary: Amanda Lynam, head of macro credit research at BlackRock, describes the state of credit markets as "pretty healthy resilience," but sees signs of distress with repeat defaulters and smaller companies defaulting at a higher rate.

raw.headline: Credit Market Resilient Amid Pockets of Stress: BlackRock's Lynam
raw.summary: Amanda Lynam, head of macro credit research at BlackRock, describes the state of credit markets as "pretty healthy resilience," but sees signs of distress with repeat defaulters and smaller companies defaulting at a higher rate.

headline: BlackRock imposes restriction on use of company devices for China travel, Bloomberg News reports
summary: BlackRock has asked its staff visiting China for business trips to use temporary loaner phones and avoid using company laptops, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing an internal memo. The world's largest asset manager told its staff that using company-issued employee devices, including iPhones and iPads, is not permitted, the report said. BlackRock also barred the use of company laptops or remote access via virtual private networks, the report said, adding that employees will not have access to the BlackRock network during personal travel in China.

raw.headline: BlackRock imposes restriction on use of company devices for China travel, Bloomberg News reports
raw.summary: BlackRock has asked its staff visiting China for business trips to use temporary loaner phones and avoid using company laptops, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing an internal memo. The world's largest asset manager told its staff that using company-issued employee devices, including iPhones and iPads, is not permitted, the report said. BlackRock also barred the use of company laptops or remote access via virtual private networks, the report said, adding that employees will not have access to the BlackRock network during personal travel in China.
